Queries.GetAllStation: SELECT Departure_station_name,Duration From BikeStations Where ((Departure_station_id LIKE '%' + @stationname +'%') OR (Departure_station_name LIKE '%' + @stationname +'%')) ORDER BY Departure_station_name OFFSET (@PageNumber-1)*@PageSize ROWS FETCH NEXT @PageSize ROWS ONLY
Queries.AllResult: SELECT Departure_station_name,Duration From BikeStations ORDER BY Departure_station_name OFFSET (@PageNumber-1)*@PageSize ROWS FETCH NEXT @PageSize ROWS ONLY
Queries.Additional: SELECT TOP 5 Departure_station_name, COUNT (*) As DepartureStation, SUM(Covered_distance) AS TotalDistance, AVG(Covered_distance) AS AverageDistance FROM BikeStations GROUP BY Departure_station_name order by DepartureStation DESC;
Queries.ReturnPopular: SELECT TOP 5 Return_station_name, COUNT (*) As ReturnStation, SUM(Covered_distance) AS TotalDistance, AVG(Covered_distance) AS AverageDistance FROM BikeStations GROUP BY Return_station_name order by ReturnStation DESC;
Queries.FilterByMonth: SELECT * , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BikeStations WHERE datepart(month,Departure) = @month and datepart(year,Departure) = @year) AS TotalCount FROM BikeStations WHERE datepart(month,Departure) = @month and datepart(year,Departure) = @year ORDER BY Departure OFFSET (@PageNumber-1)*@PageSize ROWS FETCH NEXT @PageSize ROWS ONLY;
